nodes.text: The Adventures of BB-8 is a canon DK Readers Level 2 title retelling the BB-series astromech droid BB-8's journey during the events of the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was written by David Fentiman and was published by DK Publishing on June 7, 2016.
The book was reissued as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: R2-D2 Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.
The fate of the galaxy depends on BB-8 in DK Readers L2: Star Wars™: The Adventures of BB-8!

Follow brave BB-8 as he gets caught up in the battle to save the galaxy. Learn about the heroic Resistance and the sinister First Order. Meet BB-8's new friends, and see them join together to defeat evil!
